definitions.title: mantle
definitions.body: (v. esp. SAC:JPhil. xxvi (1899), 307 f., cf. Andr:M 74*, with conj. as to orig. Pers. form; > trousers; NH; J Aram. id., with both mngs., also shoes; Ar. sirba0lun mantle is loan-word Frä:47; Egypt. Ar. zrbwl shoe is Gk. loan-word acc. to Vollers:ZMG li (1897), 298, cf. Krauss:ii. 412);—pl. sf. [[סַרְבָּלֵיהוֹן]] Da 3:21, Da 3:27.
